dataList.desc:
- Targeting for all Skills will be reset.
- Effects activated at Turn Start will not be updated.
dataList.rawDesc: Halve the Speed of all enemies.

dataList.desc: - Resets any slotted E.G.O Skills for all characters, and targeting for all Skills will be reset.
dataList.rawDesc: Slot in a single E.G.O Skill without consuming any E.G.O resources.
